function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of the virus within bank branches due to close customer and employee interactions","Impact":"Risk of increased transmission of contagious diseases, leading to potential illness and health complications for employees and customers","Mitigation":"Redesign branch layout to observe social distance, improve hygiene, ventilation, and limit the number of customers at a given moment","Technologies":"Enhanced ventilation systems, digital queue management systems, and contactless transaction technologies","People":"Bank employees and customers","Owner":"Bank management and regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Resistance from customers intimidated by increased digitalization, leading to potential exclusion from banking services","Impact":"Risk of alienating certain customer segments and hindering access to essential banking services","Mitigation":"Proactive efforts to reach and educate intimidated customers, leveraging retrained employees to assist with digital adoption","Technologies":"Educational resources, personalized support services, and user-friendly digital interfaces","People":"Customers with low digital literacy or comfort","Owner":"Bank management and customer support teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate decision-making by customers during distress, leading to potential financial challenges","Impact":"Risk of customers making short-sighted decisions during times of distress, leading to financial instability","Mitigation":"Provide financial literacy support and guidance through retrained employees to assist customers in making informed decisions","Technologies":"Financial education resources, decision-making tools, and personalized advisory services","People":"Customers facing financial distress","Owner":"Bank advisory and customer support teams"}]}
